name: Wintry Mushroom Soup
preparation: In a large bowl, whisk together seasoning with milk; set aside.
In Wok, heat butter over medium-high heat. Add mushrooms; sauté until lightly browned, about 5 min.
Add reserved seasoning mixture; bring to a boil, stirring often. Simmer until thickened, 1–2 min.
tips: Save prep time and buy a package of pre-sliced mushrooms. Or mix and match—choose your favourite kinds for a medley of flavour. You’ll need a generous 1⁄2 lb (225 g) whole mushrooms.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with an open-faced or half sandwich made with 1 slice whole-grain bread, 1⁄2 tbsp mayo, 1⁄2 cup lean protein (chicken or canned salmon), and 1⁄2 cup leafy greens.

products.name: Wintry Mushroom Soup Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Where are all our mushroom lovers? This one's for you! A creamy, comforting classic with just a touch of heat, Wintry Mushroom Soup is easily made with three simple ingredients: Milk, butter, and mushrooms. A winter warmer you'll enjoy over and over again!

products.name: Wok & Glass Lid
summary: Classic Wok with curvy side & generous surface area for stir-frying.
